name: Intro
_source: speak;Marisa;Ah, not bad for a hot pot I just thought of in an hour.
speak;Reimu;Ah, if only I brought my red miso with me.|Then this would be really good.
speak;Alice;Hmm, could use some seasoning.|Maybe some star anise or five spice.
speak;Marisa;Has not needing to eat made ya' pickier or something?
speak;Alice;I am very particular about my food.|Hand me that ladle, and I'll show you.
speak;Marisa;Tut tut, you had your chance.
speak;Mima;Ah, a warm meal. It's definitely a blessing.
speak;Reimu;Since when was I one of the yea's?
speak;Marisa;I'll take what I can get.
speak;Kasen;I would really prefer if it had some daikon too.
speak;Marisa;Drinking in the middle of the day?
speak;Kasen;As long as I don't have too much.
speak;Reimu;Wait a minute, I thought you said no booze!!
speak;Kasen;That was before I realized how long this campaign will be...|Are we really going to cut into Suika's alcohol rations?
speak;Kasen;Anyways, I think we've rested enough. Let's get back onto the trail.
speak;Marisa;Alright alright, let's go. *Sigh* Really wanted to enjoy this one.
speak;Marisa;Huh, it usually doesn't snow here this time of year.
speak;Reimu;It's like the missing spring incident all over again.
speak;Kasen;Someone is tampering with the weather again, but who?
speak;Reimu;It better not be that blue-haired brat again!
speak;Marisa;Man, if I knew that we were going to be hittin' snow,|I would've made more hot pot.
speak;Reimu;Not like I would've eaten more of it.
speak;Marisa;Lucky you that I always come prepared!
speak;Mima;Can I get a scarf too~?
speak;Mima;Don't you have enough to share with the whole class?
speak;Marisa;I consider myself graduated, thank you very much!
speak;Yumeko;Alright, witch. Your job is simple: keep the enemy at bay for as long as possible.
speak;Yumeko;Hmm, you don't seem to speak much, do you?
speak;Yumeko;...I'll just take that as a positive.|I'll be sure the master compensates you properly after this battle.
speak;Yumeko;...Alright then, now I must go back and guard the young master.|I wish you the best.
speak;;This map's clear bonus is 1000 Bonus EXP, but you won't get a single point if you go over 20 turns!;;;hint
speak;;Oh, and just to let you know, Alice isn't a patient person! She'll leave in 15 turns if you're just too slow!;;;hint
